name: iticker – The information ticker
author: iticker

sections.installation:
1. Visit itickerapp.com and signin with Twitter to create and configure your iTICKER toolbar.

  2. Upload iticker.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  3. In your WordPress admin area, go to the Plugins page and activate the ITICKER plugin.

  4. From the Appearance menu, select ITICKER Configuration and enter your ITICKER ID. Get your ITICKER ID by signing in at www.itickerapp.com, clicking on ‘My iticker’, selecting ‘install’ and then ‘WordPress’ from the list of supported platforms. Your ID will be in the instructions.

Follow iTICKER to stay up-to-date with new developments.
sections.faq: Contact us at support [at] itickerapp [dot] com if you need any help installing the plugin or have any feature requests.

short_description: iTICKER toolbar for websites and blogs: Free, fun and customisable bar to enhance and promote your content. Opt-in to earn with iTICKER ads and rewards

screenshots.caption: Add only the apps you want.
